Player History
Drafted in 23rd round, 368th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Kevin Kunio (ATL)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $557,143 through salary arbitration...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2016, off Jorge Rubio (ATL)...
Injured on 9/27/2016 with a Bruised Cheekbone, out for 2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/14/2017 to a 5-year deal worth $3,400,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by St. Louis (C) on 3/8/2018.
